entry.data:
CLOUDY
AREAS OF DENSE FOG
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

AREAS OF DENSE FOG IN THE MORNING
CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 30S IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 20

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
LOWS 15 TO 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
